name: Manuela Waldner
content: Manuela Waldner | TU Wien – Research Unit of Computer Graphics Skip to main content Manuela Waldner Details TitleAssociate Prof. Dr.in techn. MSc Function: Professor Workgroup Visualization Group RoomHD0503 Links Phone+43-1-58801-18641 E-Mailwaldner [at] cg.tuwien.ac.at TISS Business card ORCID iD 0000-0003-1387-5132 WikidataQ110125318 FunctionAssociate professorResearch WorkI am an associate professor researching visual interfaces for the interactive exploration and analysis of complex data. I am and have been involved in multiple research projects:Large-scale interactive geographic data visualization in weBIGeo (TU Wien, NetIdee, 2024-2025)Joint human-machine data exploration (TU Wien, FWF Stand-alone project, 2023-2028)Visual context analysis in Visual Analytics and Computer Vision Meet Cultural Heritage (TU Wien with FH St.Pölten, FWF doc.funds.connect, 2023-2027, as core faculty member)Visual information foraging in the Deskollage project (TU Wien, FWF Hertha Firnberg, 2015-2019)Visual attention guidance in the Illustrative Visualization project (TU Wien, WWTF project by Ivan Viola)Interfaces for co-located collaborative work in emerging display environments in the Deskotheque project (TU Graz, FFG BRIDGE, 2009-2011)InterestsMy research interests cover visualization and human-computer interaction with a special focus on:Visual exploratory analysis of large and unstructured dataHuman-AI collaboration for data analysisGuiding visual attention in complex visual displaysInterfaces and collaborative interaction techniques for emerging display environments (virtual reality, large-scale displays, multi-display environments, etc.)For a publication list including also my previous publications, see DBLP.Hobbiesskiing and ski touringmountaineering and hikingbikingspending time with my family News PhD position in Human-AI Collaboration for Exploration of Large Unstructured Dataposted on 26.
